title: provisions of the Private Security Services (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 19 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Private Security Services (Amendment)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Private Security Services (Amendment) 

Act 2021 (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited private security service (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2021

title: provisions of the Private Security Services (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 19 of
heading: 2. The 22nd day of July 2021 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 22nd day of July 2021 is appointed as the day on which the following 
provisions of the Private Security Services (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 19 of 
2021) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

(b) 

section 1; 

section 2(1)(a), other than insofar as it relates to the insertion of 
the definitions of “court messenger” and “enforcement guard” 
into section 2(1) of the Private Security Services Act 2004 (No. 
12 of 2004); 

(c) 

sections 3 to 8. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 July, 2021. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [379] 3
